## getUrlQuery() function

根据URL获取参数对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getUrlQuery(url: string, options?: {
    position: 'search' | 'hash';
    decode?: boolean;
}): Record<string, string>;
```

**Returns:**

Record&lt;string, string&gt;

## Example

getUrlQuery('xxx.com?a=1&amp;b=2', { position: 'search' }<!-- -->) // 返回：<!-- -->{ a: 1, b: 2 } getUrlQuery('xxx.com?a=1&amp;b=2\#/path/?c=3&amp;d=4', { position: 'hash' }<!-- -->) // 返回：<!-- -->{ c: 3, d: 4 }
